Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Establishes a bill of rights for family members and visitors of incarcerated individuals
Summary: Establishes a bill of rights for family members and visitors of incarcerated individuals including the establishment of an independent office for visitation oversight to monitor implementation, receive complaints, and ensure compliance.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to establishing a bill of rights for family members and visitors of incarcerated individuals
